website_summaries.verdict: One of the best premium throw bags that offers higher durability and cord strength.
pros: Rugged Cordura bag offers better durability and visibility than most budget options available
Rope is bright yellow for clearer visibility in open water
Everything ties up tightly for easy storage
cons: The yellow dye in the rope can run after getting wet and bleed on other surfaces it touches

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, already rescued a swimmer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to any rescue truck or survival kit. We rescued our first patient from the trinity river a few weeks ago. It was easy to throw out and he had no problem hanging on as we hoisted him up the steep bank. It floats, is hi-viz, and is easily cooled back in the bag. Great value for the prices. You will want a carabiner to attach the end to something sturdy. That is the only thing that was not included.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ewing

customer_reviews.title: NRS is the best you can get
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality. THANKFULLY it hasn't had to be used much! But it is definitely good to have one on hand while white water rafting! We did lots of research reading reviews to find a good, safe one & NRS seems to be the best option, & I found it in here for the same pricing but with Prime so definitely a decent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It does what it was designed to do.
customer_reviews.text: When thrown correctly it works great. Be sure to practice often so you will be confident if you have to use it in an emergency
customer_reviews.author: mountainbiker407

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safety equipment
customer_reviews.text: High quality, haven't had to use it yet but very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safety equipment
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it yet but very happy with the quality and purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big, heavy duty throw bag.
customer_reviews.text: Big, heavy duty throw bag. I could probably have with the smaller version. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: camplight

customer_reviews.title: These colors DO RUN!
customer_reviews.text: This works fine but the yellow color of the rope runs after its first use and can stain the inside of your car on the way home.
customer_reviews.author: JA Fred

customer_reviews.title: 75' Throw Bag
customer_reviews.text: This rope throw bag is designed for water rescue, but I am using it to hold the anchor line in my kayak. This is the same quality bag that I used in the fire service on the water rescue team. The stuff bag keeps the rope from tangling in the kayak and prevents the chance of the rope grabbing a body part during deployment. This is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, does what you would expect as a throw bag! Yes the line floats....
customer_reviews.author: N*****

customer_reviews.title: Looks Like Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have not thrown it yet. Overall quality looks very good.
customer_reviews.author: Dave K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent well made item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent well made item. cery light and easy to pack. Very nice to have, hope I never have to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Vesgaard

customer_reviews.title: NRS 75 ft. Rescue Bag
customer_reviews.text: I fish on the San Juan,keep this in my boat just in case someone might need some life saving help.
customer_reviews.author: dalpol

customer_reviews.title: NRS 75 ft Rescue Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a very fair price. The company ships the item quickly. It is easy to toss and very compact. We use it as a required safety tow bag for 6 man outrigger canoe races in Southern California.
customer_reviews.author: Pet Owner

customer_reviews.title: Great throw bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! We use this exact throw bag on my department for water rescue. I had to get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

product_meta.title: NRS Standard Rescue Throw Rope
product_meta.description: Whitewater safety is a serious matter. The NRS Standard Rescue Throw Bag is an excellent tool for protecting you and your buddies in swiftwater emergency situations. Includes an elastic loop and 'pocket' will hold a glow stick or "chem light" for low light rescues. Internal foam flotation keeps the bag on the top of the water where you need it for rescue.
feature_bullets: 75-FOOT ROPE FOR PLENTY OF RANGE: Rugged Cordura throw bag contains a 75-foot throw rope for emergency situations on the water
QUICK-DRYING DESIGN: 2-inch mesh panel for better drainage and reduced dry time if the rope or bag gets wet
HIGH VISIBILITY IN LOW LIGHT: 3/8 polypropylene rope is yellow for high visibility in dark or turbulent waters
1,900-POUND STRENGTH: The rope has a 1,900-pound tensile strength and floats so you never lose it under the water
EASY THROWING AND RELOADING: A barrel-lock drawstring is in a flared nylon top for smoother throws, plus easy reloading and closure
